SmsPackagesStatistics.document:
This API is used to collect statistics on a user's packages.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
SmsPackagesStatistics.name: Collects statistics on packages

members.document: The creation time of the package in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
members.name: PackageCreateTime

members.document: The effective time of the package in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
members.name: PackageEffectiveTime

members.document: The expiration time of the package in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
members.name: PackageExpiredTime

members.document: Number of SMS messages in the package
members.name: PackageAmount

members.document: Package type. 0: gifted package; 1: purchased package.
members.name: PackageType

members.document: Current number of used messages in the package.
members.name: CurrentUsage

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 1400006666.
members.name: SmsSdkAppId

members.document: Upper limit (number of packages to be pulled)
members.name: Limit

members.document:
Start time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050113 (13:00 on May 1, 2021).
Note: the creation time of a pulled package should not be earlier than the start time.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document:
End time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050118 (18:00 on May 1, 2021).
Note: `EndTime` must be later than `BeginTime`. The creation time of a pulled package should not be later than the end time.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
